plot outline: John Day is a bank manager and lives with his wife Maria Day. The couple has recently lost their only daughter. Maria is always depressed and never opens up with anyone. One day when John is away for office work, a courier-boy enters the house and takes Maria as a captive, then a series of misfortunes start to happen.
title: John Day
plot: A bank manager and his wife, still grieving over their daughter who died in a fire, become pawns in a bank heist with ties to corruption and fraud.

_John Day_ (qv) works in Royal Citizen Cooperative Bank as a manager living with his wife Maria few years back they had lost their daughter Pearl in forest fire.Maria lives in depression since then one day while John is at work Maria is held captive at home and hurt badly, John is asked to follow the instructions of a stranger whose arrived to loot the bank.The news spreads fast and Inspector Gautam asks his girlfriend Tabbasum about some important documents in Bank when Tabbasum goes to recover the documents John finds that it belongs to Casablanca Estate.John follows them and finds that Casablanca is a big scam which has Gautam as well as many big names involved in it .John now decides to revenge on everyone involved in destroying his family as the scam connects to Maria being comatose and Pearl's tragic death.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
